import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[1]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = A @ x[t] + B @ u[t] + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t + 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = (A @ x[t] + B @ u[t]) * w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t + 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = A @ x[t] * (B @ u[t]) + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t + 1] + v[t]
    return y

        y[t] = C @ x[t + 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + -1] = A @ x[t] + B @ u[t] + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t + 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = A @ x[t] + B @ u[t] + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t - 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = A @ x[t] + B @ u[t] + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t * 1] + v[t]
    return y

import numpy as np

def simulate_system(A, B, C, x0, u, w, v):
    num_steps = u.shape[0]
    state_dim = x0.shape[0]
    output_dim = C.shape[0]
    x = np.zeros((num_steps + 1, state_dim))
    y = np.zeros((num_steps, output_dim))
    x[0] = x0
    for t in range(num_steps):
        x[t + 1] = A @ x[t] + B @ u[t] + w[t]
        y[t] = C @ x[t + -1] + v[t]
    return y
